title: Glassblowing
description: Glassblowing introduces readers to the art of blown glass. This informational book, told from the first-person point of view of a glassblower, takes the reader through the process of making a glass bowl. Descriptive words and action verbs, together with step-by-step photographs, make this an enjoyable book for early readers.
reviewWords: beautiful, bubble, glass, glassblower, gooey, pipe
awareness: Blends : Recognize the sounds of L-family blends
phonics: Consonant Blends : Associate the sounds of L-family blends with their spelling
grammar: Verbs                : Recognize that verbs are action words
wordWork: Content Vocabulary                : Understand and use content vocabulary related to glassblowing
